attributes.action: Force the FA to have an independant body, and not themselves, conduct a review into the failings of the English national team in the World Cup 2006 and Euro 2008 qualifiers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The FA have decided to conduct their own investigation into the failure of England Football over tha past few years. The FA will be getting paid to conduct this investigation where nothing will be found. An independant body need to tell the FA what they are doing wrong which every member of the public can see.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
